name: jabber-caps-browser
tagline: Explore features advertised by Jabber clients
body:
jabber-caps-browser is an addon to [jabber.el](http://emacs-jabber.sourceforge.net/), the Emacs Jabber client.  It offers a visual presentation of the features supported by the Jabber clients that your contacts use.

This is all based on information received through [XEP-0115: Entity Capabilities](http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0115.html).

### Screenshots

My client currently knows about a few different pieces of software:

![[screenshot]](images/caps-1-by-software-name.png)

It knows about one version of Gajim, and can list its features:

![[screenshot]](images/caps-2-software-features.png)

It knows about two versions of Adium.  There is a list of features common to all of them, and a list of unique features:

![[screenshot]](images/caps-3-compare-versions.png)

It can also list all the software versions that support a particular feature:

![[screenshot]](images/caps-4-lookup-by-feature.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
